Merge pull request #1 from vivekkiran/patch-1

Upgrade lunr.js from 0.4.3 to  0.5.2

Upgrade lunr.js from 0.4.3 to  0.5.2

https://github.com/olivernn/lunr.js/blob/master/CHANGELOG.mdown
Changelog
0.5.2

Use npm they said, it'll be easy they said.
0.5.1

Because npm issues :(
0.5.0

Add plugin support to enable i18n and other extensions to lunr.
Add AMD support #72 thanks lnwdr.
lunr.Vector now implemented using linked lists for better performance especially in indexes with large numbers of unique tokens.
Build system clean up.
0.4.5

Fix performance regression introduced in 0.4.4 by fixing #64.
0.4.4

Fix bug #64 idf cache should handle tokens with the same name as object properties, thanks gitgrimbo.
Intersperse source files with a semicolon as part of the build process, fixes #61, thanks shyndman.
remove Fira Sans from our appcache manifest (bug 993717)
rename to "darjeeling"
save icons and screenshots to disk, add to appcache manifest (bug 993178)
add placeholder to keep src/db/ always around
check in settings_*.js.dist
polyfill window.performance for older browsers
fix font-face indentation
set a reasonable min-width
add manifest.webapp and make this a hosted Firefox app!
less noisy console logs
queue app installations when user is offline - wahoooooooo! (fixes #3)
cachebust appcache manifest when JSON DB is refetched (fixes #27)
hide splash screen only after apps are indexed in search (issue #1)
add splash screen (fixes #1)
change `npm run-script` to `node app.js` in stackato config
fix inconsitent browser rendering of input (fixes #7)
include web font (issue #5)
remove red box-shadow when blurring search box in Firefox
add ability to clear input[type=search] in Firefox (fixes #21)
update button styles
add responsive styles for tablet and desktop - woooooo, flexbox (fixes #20)
show "open" button not "install" button if app is already installed (fixes #17)
change "install" button to "open" button after app is installed (fixes #16)
add logic to install hosted and packaged apps (fixes #2)
add more logging when server starts and do not use `npm start` (issue #9)
use --settings flag instead of DEBUG env var (fixes #9)

remove remnants of login
